sourcing.instructions: - Lithium Carbonate: Chemical suppliers or online retailers.
steps: - Lithium Carbonate: Chemical suppliers or online retailers.
1. In a clean glass container, add 15.0 g of Lithium Carbonate and 2.0 g of Manganese Oxide.
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a clean glass container, add 15.0 g of Lithium Carbonate and 2.0 g of Manganese Oxide.

steps: 1. Preheat the furnace to 600 째C (1112 째F).
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat the furnace to 600 째C (1112 째F).

steps: 1. After sintering, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool slowly to room temperature (approximately 6 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After sintering, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool slowly to room temperature (approximately 6 hours).

steps: 1. Clean the surface of the sample with 10.0 g of Ethanol to remove any residual contaminants.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Clean the surface of the sample with 10.0 g of Ethanol to remove any residual contaminants.
